create_group_desc: Start a new Secret Santa group no cap
group_name_desc: Enter a unique name for your group fr

no_groups: You are not in any Secret Santa groups rn, it's giving lonely
view_details_desc: View members and manage this group bestie
creator: Creator (main character energy)
your_recipient: Your Secret Santa recipient is: %s and that's the tea
your_recipient_with_gift: Your Secret Santa recipient is %s. Your gift to give is %s no cap
add_nearby_player_desc: Add a player near you to the group bestie

no_nearby_players: No players nearby rn, ghost town fr
member_added: Member added successfully! We're so back

player_in_another_group: This player is already in another active group, respectfully
remove_member_desc: Remove a member from the group (it's giving drama)
remove_member_confirm: Are you sure you want to remove %s from the group? That's kinda sus ngl
no_members_to_remove: No members available to remove rn

cannot_remove_creator: Cannot remove the group creator bestie (they're the main character)
ready_group_desc: Finalize the group and assign Secret Santas fr
ready_group_confirm: Are you sure you want to ready up this group? Once ready, Secret Santa assignments will be made and the group cannot be modified. No cap this is permanent
group_ready: Group is ready! Secret Santa assignments have been made fr fr
group_already_ready: This group is already ready bestie
not_enough_members: Not enough members to ready up (minimum 2 required) ngl that's not it
disband_group_desc: Delete this group permanently (it's giving nuclear option)
disband_group_confirm: Are you sure you want to disband this group? This action cannot be undone fr, we're cooked
group_disbanded: Group disbanded successfully! It's so over
player_not_found: Player not found bestie, they're ghosting
not_creator: You are not the group creator fr
not_in_group: You are not in this group lowkey

member_not_found: Member not found in group bestie
gift_list_prompt: Would you like to generate a random gift list for each participant? That's lowkey fire
assignment_failed: Failed to create Secret Santa assignments, we're cooked fr
